text:
@Mike_Pence Great job on fighting for the unborn, but then depriving the living of affordable healthcare, PPE, science-based information about #COVID19 , freedom from children being locked in cages . . .

Yeah--about that "sanctity of human life" schtick. Only your base is buying that line.
